<< fftw FFTW ifft >>

FFTWwrapper

load/free FFTW library dynamically.

Syntax

r = FFTWwrapper('load')
r = FFTWwrapper('load', fftwlibraryname, fftwflibraryname)
r = FFTWwrapper('free')

Input argument

'load'

load FFTW library.

'free'

free FFTW library.

fftwlibraryname

a string: fftw library name.

fftwflibraryname

a string: fftw float library name.

Output argument

r

a logical.

Description

FFTWwrapper is an internal builtin used to load FFTW library dynamically.

See also

fft.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
